mapper.select: select * from ( select * from accom where accom_num>#{accom_num} and accomChk=0 order by accom_num asc ) where rownum=1
select * from ( select * from accom where accom_num<#{accom_num} and accomChk=0 order by accom_num desc ) where rownum=1

mapper.select: select * from accom where accom_num = #{accom_num} and accomChk = 0
